pull.title: ci: Switch more tasks to self-hosted
pull.body: This is recommended by Cirrus CI to reduce the costs. See also https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/28098

### Conflicts

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
